text: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا

translation.en: And remember what is recited in your houses of the verses of Allah and wisdom. Indeed, Allah is ever Subtle and Acquainted [with all things]
translation.id: Dan ingatlah apa yang dibacakan di rumahmu dari ayat-ayat Allah dan hikmah (sunah Nabimu). Sungguh, Allah Mahalembut, Maha Mengetahui
